  • Method Details

    • createComment

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping public ResponseCommentDTO createComment(@RequestBody RequestCommentDTO requestCommentDTO, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Creates a new comment.
      Parameters:
      requestCommentDTO - The DTO containing the details of the comment to be created.
      authentication - The authentication object representing the current user.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the created comment.

    • deleteComment

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public ResponseCommentDTO deleteComment(@PathVariable String id, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Deletes a comment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the comment to be deleted.
      authentication - The authentication object representing the current user.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the deleted comment.
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - If the comment with the specified ID is not found.

    • getCommentsByPostIdentifier

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping("/{id}") public Map<String,Object> getCommentsByPostIdentifier(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int page)
      Retrieves comments for a post identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the post.
      page - The page number for pagination.
      Returns:
      map that includes 50 comments, overall number of comments, current comment page and overall number of pages.

    • updateCommentById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @PatchMapping("/{id}") public ResponseCommentDTO updateCommentById(@RequestBody RequestCommentDTO requestCommentDTO, @PathVariable String id, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication) throws CommentNotFoundException
      Updates a comment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      requestCommentDTO - The DTO containing the updated details of the comment.
      id - The ID of the comment to be updated.
      authentication - The authentication object representing the current user.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the updated comment.
      Throws:
      CommentNotFoundException - If the comment with the specified ID is not found or Authors and User's data does not match.
